See note below.* | | Physician and Surgeon Postgraduate Training License Holders | |[Medical Board of California](http://www.mbc.ca.gov/) BPC §§ [2064.5](https://leginfo.legislature.ca.gov/faces/codes_displaySection.xhtml?sectionNum=2064.5.&lawCode=BPC) & [2065](https://leginfo.legislature.ca.gov/faces/codes_displaySection.xhtml?sectionNum=2065.&lawCode=BPC) | | - May practice medicine, including administering vaccines, whenever and wherever required as part of postgraduate training program. | | Visiting Fellow Registrant | | [Medical Board of California](http://www.mbc.ca.gov/) BPC §§ [2111](http://leginfo.legislature.ca.gov/faces/codes_displaySection.xhtml?sectionNum=2111.&lawCode=BPC) & [2112](http://leginfo.legislature.ca.gov/faces/codes_displaySection.xhtml?sectionNum=2112.&lawCode=BPC) | | - May practice medicine, including administering vaccines, in the department or division in the medical school to which they are appointed, under the direction of the head of the department to which they are appointed, and supervised by the staff of the medical school's medical center;
